temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: The temperature affects how comfortable your ride will be. Ideal cycling temperatures are between 15-25Â°C. Temperatures outside this range will lower the biking score.

wind.title: Wind Speed
wind.description: Wind speed can make cycling more challenging. Ideal conditions are below 3 m/s. Strong winds (>8 m/s) significantly lower the biking score.

humidity.title: Humidity
humidity.description: Humidity affects how comfortable the temperature feels. Ideal humidity is between 30-60%. High humidity makes warm days feel hotter and can make cycling more strenuous.
